headline: Kimco Realty (KIM): Valuation Insights Following S&P Credit Rating Upgrade and Strengthened Operations
summary: S&P Global Ratings has upgraded Kimco Realty (KIM) to an A- credit rating with a Stable Outlook. This move highlights the company’s steady cash flows and strong operations, which are driven by its grocery-anchored property strategy. See our latest analysis for Kimco Realty. Kimco Realty’s recent ‘A-’ credit rating upgrade has helped offset some market caution, but the stock’s share price return this past year remains slightly negative. Still, long-term investors have seen over 32% total...
